initBorrow.liquidityNotification: Liquidity for this transaction comes from
initBorrow.helper: Liquidity for this transaction comes from %s

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: With Fuji you reduce your loan expenses by ~10%. The protocol constantly monitors borrow markets and automatically refinances its debt positions at the best available rates.

healthFactor.title: Health Factor
healthFactor.tooltip:
The health factor represents the safety of your loan derived from the proportion of collateral versus amount borrowed.
Keep it above 1 to avoid liquidation.

currentLoanToValue.title: Current Loan-to-Value
currentLoanToValue.tooltip:
The Maximum Loan-to-Value ratio represents the maximum borrow limit.
A max. LTV of %1$s means the user can borrow up to $ %2$s in the principal currency for every $100 worth of collateral.
With LTV above they risk a liquidation.
